info.title: TargetVal Gateway API
info.description: **Canonical 6‑domain / 55‑module** OpenAPI. Each module is a live endpoint returning an Evidence envelope. Literature and synthesis endpoints are additive and not counted as modules. Exactly 55 module paths are defined here.
